snippet: An unusual turn of phrase, combined with Donald Trump’s unique pronunciation of it, has confused, and amused, listeners....
abstract: Donald Trump's campaign says that presidential candidate has been saying phrase big league, not bigly; Trump has used phrase repeatedly in debates and at campaign rallies and speeches; audio analysis by linguists confirms claim.
lead_paragraph: An unusual turn of phrase, combined with Donald Trump’s unique pronunciation of it, has confused, and amused, listeners.

headline.main: Yes, Trump Really Is Saying ‘Big League,’ Not ‘Bigly,’ Linguists Say
headline.print_headline: Yes, Trump Is Saying ‘Big League,’ Not ‘Bigly’
